Text: FW EGM Legal Allocation Cc B NonPrivilegedpst Mark Richard Can we please get a list of the attorneys in your groups that work on EGM cases by the end of today We are attempting to respond to a request from the EGM Office of the Chair Thanks Sayed Original Message From Leschber Edie Sent Wednesday October PM To Khoja Sayed Subject FW EGM Legal Allocation Original Message From Korkmas Deb Sent Wednesday October PM To Leschber Edie Subject RE EGM Legal Allocation Edie the attorneys in the Global Markets area are as follows Alan Aronowitz Dan Rogers Ned Crady John Boomer Robert Bruce Dominic Carolan Wayne Gresham Matthias Lee Singapore Jane McBride Japan David Minns Australia Limor Nissan NY Coralina Rivera Mike Robison John Viverito I have not heard back from Mark Taylor or Richard Sanders as of yet Sorry Maybe just guess for them Deb Original Message From Leschber Edie Sent Wednesday October AM To Korkmas Deb Subject EGM Legal Allocation Deb EGM is requesting a list of the attorneys that work on EGM cases Based on our allocation schedule I have attached it again for your reference the following cost center owners are allocating costs to EGM Sanders Taylor Aronowitz Cash Could you please give me a list of attorneys within these groups that work on EGM I realize that Aronowitzs group is EGM so a list of attorneys in that group would work I also realize that Michelle Cash is probably the one within her own group who would do any work for them In addition though for Sanders and Taylor can you find out from them who in their group would work on EGM Is it them or attorneys within their groups I need to have this information today if possible Thanks Edie File Allocation Worksheetsxls
